last_episode_to_air.name: Felina
last_episode_to_air.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by Vince Gilligan, Jimmy Kimmel and many cast members of Breaking Bad, to discuss the Breaking Bad series finale, "Felina".

name: Talking Bad
overview: Talking Bad is a weekly half-hour after-show on AMC that serves as an accompaniment to the last eight episodes of Breaking Bad. The host, Chris Hardwick, who had already worked on Talking Dead, the live talk show program for AMC's The Walking Dead, analyzes and discuses the latest episodes with special guest.

episodes.name: Blood Money
episodes.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by Vince Gilligan, creator and executive producer of Breaking Bad, and superfan Julie Bowen to discuss the Breaking Bad episode, "Blood Money".

episodes.name: Buried
episodes.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by Aaron Paul, who plays Jesse Pinkman, and Anna Gunn, who plays Skyler White, to discuss the Breaking Bad episode, "Buried".

episodes.name: Confessions
episodes.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by Bob Odenkirk, who plays Saul Goodman, and Samuel L. Jackson, to discuss the Breaking Bad episode, "Confessions".

episodes.name: Rabid Dog
episodes.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by RJ Mitte, who plays Walter White Jr., and Betsy Brandt who plays Marie Schrader, to discuss the Breaking Bad episode, "Rabid Dog".

episodes.name: To'hajiilee
episodes.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by Steven Michael Quezada, who plays Steven Gomez, and Don Cheadle, to discuss the Breaking Bad episode, "To'hajiilee".

episodes.name: Ozymandias
episodes.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by Dean Norris, who plays Hank Schrader, and Bill Hader, to discuss the Breaking Bad episode, "Ozymandias".

episodes.name: Granite State
episodes.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by Adam Scott, Bryan Johnson and Matt Jones, to discuss the Breaking Bad episode, "Granite State".

episodes.name: Felina
episodes.overview: Chris Hardwick is joined by Vince Gilligan, Jimmy Kimmel and many cast members of Breaking Bad, to discuss the Breaking Bad series finale, "Felina".
